home.name: I'm Vincent!
home.title: Welcome to my portfolio! 🌐
home.description: I am a full-stack developer with a passion for creating beautiful and functional websites.

timeline.birth: I'm born in Aix-en-Provence, in France 👶
timeline.firstSteps: First Steps in IT 🧑‍💻 (13 years later, just that!)
timeline.helpingMates: In high school, I helped my classmates prepare for their exams, especially in science 📚
timeline.graduation: I obtained my high school diploma in Maths / Physics - Chemistry with honors 🎓
timeline.epitech: I entered EPITECH Montpellier 🚀 I was totally in the unknown, I had never programmed before!
timeline.passion: I gradually discovered my passion for programming while participating in the school's Promoting 🌟
timeline.onBoarding: I gained skills, participated in increasingly complex projects, and also took part in EPITECH's admission process 🛠️
timeline.webDev: I discovered web development, which also became a real passion for me!
timeline.internship: I did my end-of-first-year internship at EPSA Tax, where I honed my web knowledge 🖥️
timeline.newPortfolio: I created my new portfolio, which is the one you are currently visiting 🌐!
timeline.future: I am looking forward to the future and all the projects that await me!
